ai-patthana15.39:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.39:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.39:2.1_0: A thoughtful mind doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana15.39:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.39:3.1_0: When the mind isn’t fades away they’re not disturbed with cause and reasons. ...
ai-patthana15.39:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
